SELECT id AS menuId, parent_id AS parentId, menu_name AS menuName, web_code AS webCode, menu_url AS menuUrl, icon AS icon, menu_sort AS menuSort, menu_type AS menuType, perms AS perms, is_enable AS isEnable, create_time AS createTime FROM portal_menu ORDER BY menu_sort

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_menu ( id, parent_id, menu_name, web_code, menu_url, icon, menu_sort, menu_type, perms, is_enable, create_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{webCode}, #{menuUrl}, #{icon}, #{menuSort}, #{menuType.value}, #{perms}, #{isEnable.value}, #{createId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE portal_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, menu_name = #{menuName}, web_code = #{webCode}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, icon = #{icon}, menu_sort = #{menuSort}, menu_type = #{menuType.value}, perms = #{perms}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT menu.id AS menuId, menu.parent_id AS parentId, menu.menu_name AS menuName, menu.web_code AS webCode, menu.menu_url AS menuUrl, menu.icon AS icon, menu.menu_sort AS menuSort, menu.menu_type AS menuType, menu.perms AS perms, menu.is_enable AS isEnable, menu.create_time AS createTime FROM portal_menu AS menu LEFT JOIN portal_role_menu AS roleMenu ON menu.id = roleMenu.menu_id WHERE roleMenu.role_id = #{roleId}
